excluded_products.description: Retrieve the downloads that are excluded from having this discount code applied. Returns a Loop.

name.description: Retrieve the name of the discount

code.description: Retrieve the code used to apply the discount

status.description: Retrieve the status of the discount

status_label.description: Retrieves the status label of the discount

uses.description: Retrieve the uses for the discount code

max_uses.description: Retrieve the maximum uses for the discount code

min_price.description: Retrieve the minimum spend required for the discount to be satisfied

is_single_use.description: Retrieve the usage limit per limit (if the discount can only be used once per customer)

is_not_global.description: Retrieve the property determining if a discount is not global
